subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Two of hockey’s best longtime duos, Ryan Getzlaf and Corey Perry of Anaheim and Jonathan Toews and Patrick Kane of Chicago, will be going for another Stanley Cup.
snippet: Two of hockey’s best longtime duos, Ryan Getzlaf and Corey Perry of Anaheim and Jonathan Toews and Patrick Kane of Chicago, will be going for another Stanley Cup.
